issue.title: [CF 1202] Make diminishing icon show only when immune.
issue.body:
Is there a way to make diminishing icon show only when object is immune?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1202 | Raw

comments.body:
Set the maximum stack requirement on the icon to 0.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
